OneLineDescription: Patch many record types with user supplied YAML config files
LongDescription:
Adjusts many record fields according to a user specified YAML file.

Configuration:
To create a patch, simply create one or more yaml files with the name "Ammo.yaml, Armor.yaml, Books.yaml, etc..." in a folder in the patcher data directory, and they will be read in alphabetical order by folder name.
For instance, you could create a file called Cells.yaml and put it in the C:/../Synthesis/Data/Skyrim Special Edition/AnyRecordPatcher/USLEEP directory. See the github repo release for a tool called AnyRecordExporter that makes it easy to export only the changes that a given plugin makes.
